flavorText:
"This creature has hyperevolved chameleonic abilities. It no longer mimics its surroundings, instead forcing them to take on its form."
—Simic research notes

foreignData.flavorText:
„Diese Kreatur hat ihre Chamäleonfähigkeiten weiterentwickelt. Statt sich ihrer Umgebung anzupassen, zwingt sie jetzt ihre Umgebung, sich ihr anzugleichen."
—Notizen von Simic-Forschern
foreignData.name: Verfroscher
foreignData.text: {T}: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl wird zu einem Frosch mit Basis-Stärke und -Widerstandskraft 3/3 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Esta criatura tiene habilidades camaleónicas hiperevolucionadas. Ya no copia su entorno, sino que lo fuerza a tomar su forma".
—Notas de investigación simic
foreignData.name: Omnibio
foreignData.text: {T}: La criatura objetivo se convierte en una Rana con fuerza y resistencia base de 3/3 hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Cette créature dispose des capacités hyper évoluées d'un caméléon. Elle ne change pas pour se fondre avec son environnement, c'est son environnement qui se fond avec elle. »
—Notes de recherche des Simic
foreignData.name: Omnibien
foreignData.text: {T} : La créature ciblée devient une grenouille avec une force et une endurance de base de 3/3 jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Questa creatura possiede abilità camaleontiche iperevolute. Non imita più ciò che la circonda: costringe direttamente l'ambiente ad assumere la sua stessa forma."
—Note di ricerca dei Simic
foreignData.name: Omnibio
foreignData.text: {T}: Una creatura bersaglio diventa una Rana con forza e costituzione base 3/3 fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText:
「この生物は超進化したカメレオンの能力を有する。周囲に自分を似せるのではなく、周囲を自分に似せるのだ。」
――シミックの研究メモ
foreignData.name: オムニビアン
foreignData.text: {T}：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは基本のパワーとタフネスが３/３のカエルになる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — カエル

name: Omnibian
originalText: {T}: Target creature becomes a Frog with base power and toughness 3/3 until end of turn.

rulings.text: If the target creature has any counters on it that modify its power and toughness (such as a +1/+1 counter), those counters will continue to affect the creature after it becomes 3/3. In the example given, it will be 4/4.

If the target creature is affected by any effects that modify its power or toughness without setting them to specific values (such as from Giant Growth), Omnibian’s effect will be applied before those effects. In the example given, the creature will be 6/6.
This effect changes only the power, toughness, and creature type of the targeted creature. It does not cause that creature to lose any abilities.

text: {T}: Target creature becomes a Frog with base power and toughness 3/3 until end of turn.
